Text:
Sorry 'crazy-torrent' but this is a worthless upload! 
Very poor audio and video quality. It's a in-cinema camera recording that is dark, cropped and pixellated. 
The quality is so bad I almost couldn't say for sure if this is the 2011 Muppet movie. 
I would advise others to wait for a better version of "The Muppets 2011".
